pinyin: shui3 neng2 zai4 zhou1 , yi4 neng2 fu4 zhou1

definitions.shui3 neng2 zai4 zhou1 , yi4 neng2 fu4 z: lit. water may keep the boat afloat but may also sink it (proverb); fig. the people can support a regime or overturn it; if sth is used properly, one can benefit from it, otherwise it can do harm; things can be double-edged;
